thread.section_title: Goldline Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goldline | www.goldline.com | 4 of 183
thread.title: Wesley Suhr

author: Wesley Suhr
title: Wesley Suhr
text: David Howard took me step-by-step through standard process to acquire coins, from plat. spot, $ of 1 coin & to 6 coins which amounted to my desired total purchase. He explained price guarantee, how that was enhanced by my former purchase from Goldline. Covered other details like buy-back policy, holding period, etc. Confirmation info covered by Diana was essentially the same & my 2 questions were quickly answered. David concluded with mailing/email detail for follow up. Whole process was short, quick & clear. Yes, I will recommend Goldline to friends & family.
